nodes.text: The Extorin sector was located in the Expansion Region. It contained the Extorin Major system and the Extorin Minor system. The latter shared its name with the Extorin Minor skirmishes, a conflict that involved the group known as the Extorin and that was waged at some point by 29 BBY.
By 0 ABY, the Extorin sector bordered the Thand sector northward, the Montitian Grant sector westward, the Cantons of Lahag southward, and the Great Agash and Trans-Jardeen sectors eastward.
The Extorin sector was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas.
